ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well first of all, I don t want to point fingers or anything either but have you tried to kill these velious mobs?  Sure FoH and AL (that sploiting Shada!)
ygData.messageBody:
Well first of all, I don't want to point fingers or anything either but have
you tried to kill these velious mobs? Sure FoH and AL (that sploiting
Shada!) have found ways to kill these mobs with less people, but I would
have to say the majority of guilds have not.

Believe me the challenge is NOT gone when it still takes a guild of 50
people with many Donals' 6 hours to kill two dragons. Its not as "heat and
stir" as you seem to think. Can't even begin to tell you the hours we've
spent haha. It takes a cleric 30 seconds to cast his bp - its not like its
instantaneous.

Yes I believe I said I DID read the whole post. I know they will plan to
downlevel the mobs. I just hope they actually do it. It has nothing to do
with loot but everything to do with conquoring challenges. I just like the
challenges to be fair.

Then again, maybe Paradigm sucks and we have no strategy, dunno.

Halana/Tani
Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mike Finger [mailto:mike_finger@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 2:41 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
>
>
> The nerf on the Donal's makes perfect sense to me. It is too
> powerful an
> item. They have also mentioned that were going to look at
> tuning down those
> high velious mobs that require the BP. I wish people would
> read the ENTIRE
> post and not just the parts that upset them.
>
> I don't see why everyone is so mad about this change. They
> put in an item
> that ended up being more powerful then they expected, so they
> are tuning it
> down.
>
> Kinda takes the challenge out of the mob doesn't it? Get a
> cleric in your
> group with the BP and one warrior can take any, and I mean
> ANY mob that does
> not outright kill the warrior in 30 seconds. As longs as
> your cleric can
> click fast enough. Kinda ruins the game. There is more to
> this game that
> the ph4t l33t. Otherwise it would be dead now.
>
> Plus, the way they were talking about nerfing it, still makes
> it a powerful
> item. The cleric could still completly heal the party in 3
> minutes (no
> change here from the original BP), after that the first person has 4.5
> minutes (or whatever they set as the buff time) before they
> can have the BP
> used on them, again. Not bad, in my opinion.
>
> Well, flame all you want. I don't care, I support the
> change. It's good
> for the game as a whole.
>
>
